text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Mothership GZ700GX 17.3” FHD 144Hz | 2.4 GHz i9-9980HK, RTX 2080, 128GB 2666MHz RAM, 1.5TB (3 x 512GB) PCIe SSD Raid 0 w/ Hyper Drive | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Mothership GZ700GX 17.3” FHD 144Hz | 2.4 GHz i9-9980HK, RTX 2080, 128GB 2666MHz RAM, 1.5TB (3 x 512GB) PCIe SSD Raid 0 w/ Hyper Drive | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
